subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Kosta Koufos, the 7-foot center, carried the Buckeyes past an aggressive Syracuse team. They will face No. 16 Texas A&M in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off final on Thursday night.
snippet: Kosta Koufos, the 7-foot center, carried the Buckeyes past an aggressive Syracuse team. They will face No. 16 Texas A&M in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off final on Thursday night.
